TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AVCaptureVideoDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DidDropSampleBuffer (this MonoTouch.AVFoundation.IAVCaptureVideoDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate This, MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureOutput captureOutput, MonoTouch.CoreMedia.CMSampleBuffer sampleBuffer, MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureConnection connection);

.method public static hidebysig void DidDropSampleBuffer(class MonoTouch.AVFoundation.IAVCaptureVideoDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate This, class MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureOutput captureOutput, class MonoTouch.CoreMedia.CMSampleBuffer sampleBuffer, class MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureConnection connection) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
The capture output on which the frame was captured.
Buffer containing information about the dropped frame; No video data is actually included.
The connection on which the video frame was received.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DidOutputSampleBuffer (this MonoTouch.AVFoundation.IAVCaptureVideoDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate This, MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureOutput captureOutput, MonoTouch.CoreMedia.CMSampleBuffer sampleBuffer, MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureConnection connection);

.method public static hidebysig void DidOutputSampleBuffer(class MonoTouch.AVFoundation.IAVCaptureVideoDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate This, class MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureOutput captureOutput, class MonoTouch.CoreMedia.CMSampleBuffer sampleBuffer, class MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureConnection connection) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
The capture output on which the frame was captured.
The video frame data, part of a small finite pool of buffers.
The connection on which the video frame was received.
